page.shortlink: api desktop api a5 object write setting function
page.description: The A5.WRITE_SETTING() method is a simplified version of the A5.SAVE_SETTINGS() method that stores a single Value into the setting named Setting_Name in the current database's library.

argument.name: name
argument.description: The name of the setting to receive the value.

section.title: Example
section.example: MyName = "Fred" A5.write_setting("Name", myname) Current_name = a5.read_setting("Name") current_name -> "Fred"
